name: Aklatanong - CAPSTN1
description:
You're the substitute librarian of the Quezon City Public Library (QCPL), help the students out by giving them the right books as you also learn about the classifications used in the library! 

The goal of Aklatanong is to help young students to have a better understanding about the Dewey Decimal System and how it is beneficial in the library setting. Have fun!
